channel.title: Storage on Speedle
channel.description: Recent content in Storage on Speedle

item.title: Pluggable Storage
item.description: Overview Speedle now supports two kinds of data store, OOTB: file store and etcd store. However, you can implement your own data store (e.g. with mongodb, etc) Please note the data store needs to support the watch function. This document walks through step-by-step instructions to implement a data store. Write store code to implement the PolicyStoreManager interface Create a “mystore” directory under store directory and navigate to it.
